files.patch:
@@ -149,6 +149,6 @@
-#define offset_of(klass,field)                  \
-[]() {                                          \
-  char space[sizeof (klass)];                   \
-  klass* dummyObj = (klass*)space;              \
-  char* c = (char*)(void*)&dummyObj->field;     \
-  return (size_t)(c - space);                   \
+#define offset_of(klass,field)                          \
+[]() {                                                  \
+  char space[sizeof (klass)] ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED(16);     \
+  klass* dummyObj = (klass*)space;                      \
+  char* c = (char*)(void*)&dummyObj->field;             \
+  return (size_t)(c - space);
